# XsTypes.GetStringFromEnum method

Utility function to evaluate the string representation from the enum

```csharp
public static string GetStringFromEnum(BaseTypes baseType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| baseType | the base value to represent |

## Return Value

the representation string prefixed with "xs:".
